tool.name: Get data files list
tool.description: Get a list of MetaboLights study data files filtered on factor values

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.

param.name: factor_name
param.label: Factor name to filter on.
param.help: Factor name relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. genotype.

param.name: factor_value
param.label: Factor value to filter on.
param.help: Factor value relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. cyp79.
